Training Menu: Full-body joint mobility 5 min: ankles・hips・thoracic spine light
Dynamic stretching 8 min: leg swings・lunges・trunk rotations moderate
Running drills A-skip・B-skip・butt kicks 30 m ×2 each normal
Progressive jog 5–10 min HR Z2→Z3 energetic
100 m strides 4–6 reps; walk rest; technique focus intense
Easy jog 20–30 min HR Z2 light
Long jog 45–60 min Z2 moderate
Tempo run 15–20 min Z3; conversational but somewhat hard normal
Threshold run 8–12 min ×2; rest 2–3 min; Z3.5–4 energetic
Alternating pace run 45 min: alternate 5 min Z2 / 5 min Z3 intense
Core circuit plank 30 s・side plank 30 s ×2; 2 rounds light
Hip hinge & abduction glute bridge 12×3・clamshell 15×3 moderate
Split squats 10/side ×3 + calf raises 20×3 normal
Step-ups box height 30–40 cm 10×3 + dead bug 10×3 energetic
Plyometrics box jumps 8×3 + bounding 30 m ×4 intense
Wall-lean drill 10 s ×6; feel forward center of mass light
Cadence drill metronome 170–180 bpm for 30 s ×6; interspersed with jog moderate
Midfoot strike line runs 50 m ×6; upright posture・eyes forward normal
Arm-swing control drill alternate one-hand hip touch 30 s ×6 + 50 m run energetic
Downhill form practice 2–3% gentle slope 60 m ×6; prioritize cadence intense
Diaphragmatic breathing supine inhale 4 s / exhale 6 s ×10 light
Nasal-breathing walk 10 min; conversational moderate
During jog inhale 3 steps / exhale 3 steps 10 min normal
During tempo inhale 2 steps / exhale 2 steps 8 min energetic
During hill sprints inhale 2 steps / exhale 1 step 80 m ×6; walk rest intense
